resources.string: Display a toast message \u0022Turbo Charger Connected\u0022 if Motorola Turbo Charger is connected and recognized by the system as the Turbo charger
Display a toast message \u0022Charge %\u0022 with the current battery percentage value when the charger is unplugged
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/turbotoast
